message: I'll take 999999 and leave you with 1 dollar. This is a fair deal, considering you'll lose most of your money due to inflation soon. Accept it and we can both be happy.
I'll give you 200k, but I think I deserve more considering the future value of money

This time I'm offering you 100000. Since you rejected my last offer, I'm assuming you value your future earnings more than the potential of getting more now. Let's be reasonable and take this deal before inflation eats away at our gains even further.
I'll give you 600k, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal, so I'm willing to compromise
